00036 StochasticWntCellCycleModel::StochasticWntCellCycleModel(const std::vector<double>& rParentProteinConcentrations,
00037                                                          boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellMutationState> pMutationState,
00038                                                          const unsigned& rDimension)
00039     : WntCellCycleModel(rParentProteinConcentrations, pMutationState, rDimension)

00043 
00044 void StochasticWntCellCycleModel::SetG2Duration()
00045 {
00046     TissueConfig* p_config = TissueConfig::Instance();
00047     RandomNumberGenerator* p_gen = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance();
00048 
00049     double mean = p_config->GetG2Duration();
00050     double standard_deviation = 0.9;
00051 
00052     mG2Duration = p_gen->NormalRandomDeviate(mean, standard_deviation);
00053 
00054     // Check that the normal random deviate has not returned a small or negative G2 duration
00055     if (mG2Duration < p_config->GetMinimumGapDuration())
00056     {
00057         #define COVERAGE_IGNORE
00058         mG2Duration = p_config->GetMinimumGapDuration();
00059         #undef COVERAGE_IGNORE
00060     }
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 void StochasticWntCellCycleModel::InitialiseDaughterCell()
00065 {
00066     SetG2Duration();
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 void StochasticWntCellCycleModel::Initialise()
00071 {
00072     WntCellCycleModel::Initialise();
00073     SetG2Duration();
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 void StochasticWntCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision()
00078 {
00079     AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision();
00080     SetG2Duration();
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 double StochasticWntCellCycleModel::GetG2Duration()
00085 {
00086     return mG2Duration;
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 AbstractCellCycleModel* StochasticWntCellCycleModel::CreateCellCycleModel()
00091 {
00092     return new StochasticWntCellCycleModel(*this);
00093 }
